arts.ttl: Cardiff City 0-2 Sheffield United: Kieffer Moore Nets Spectacular Brace Against Former Club
arts.sum: Sheffield United ensured they will remain top of the Championship on Christmas Day with a simple 2-0 away victory against Cardiff City. The Blades dominated the game from start to finish but it wasn’t until the second half when they opened the scoring. A spectacular chest and volley into the top right corner from Kieffer […] The post Cardiff City 0-2 Sheffield United: Kieffer Moore Nets Spectacular Brace Against Former Club appeared first on Sheff United Way.

Jak Alnwick was forced into action early in the second half, with Tom Davies linking up with Kieffer Moore on the edge of the box, but the captain was on hand to palm away to safety. Méïté was again involved in the action, forcing a save out of Cooper at the near post pushing it away for a corner.
